function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vector-borne diseases transmitted by multiple species of vectors","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread across different regions","Mitigation":"Vector control measures such as environmental management, insecticides, and habitat modification","Technologies":"Insecticide-treated bed nets, indoor residual spraying, larvicides, and environmental surveillance tools","People":"General population, especially in regions with high vector populations","Owner":"Government health agencies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of climate change on vector populations","Impact":"Shifts in vector distributions and disease transmission patterns","Mitigation":"Climate change adaptation strategies, land use management, and habitat restoration","Technologies":"Climate modelling tools, remote sensing technology, GIS mapping, and ecological monitoring systems","People":"Communities living in areas affected by climate change, wildlife populations","Owner":"Environmental agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Ecosystem disturbances and biodiversity loss","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to vector-borne diseases due to habitat destruction and species extinctions","Mitigation":"Conservation efforts, reforestation, sustainable land management, and wildlife protection measures","Technologies":"Remote sensing technology, conservation drones, DNA barcoding for species identification, and GIS mapping","People":"Local communities, indigenous populations, and wildlife habitats","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies, and international NGOs"}]}
